layer at (0,0) size 800x600

    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      LayoutText {#text} at (141,18) size 251x18
        text run at (141,18) width 251: " This should not be part of the textarea."

      LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 112x39
